item.title: The Three C's Rule Of Career Development
item.description: Working more than 6 years as Software Engineer I really started to appreciate the three C’s rule of career development. Any job must have at least two of the three C’s: Contacts which will help you to find your next engagement. Content, i.e. an exciting project that will improve your skills and will be challenging to do. Cash, i.e. a rate of pay that will makes you smile rather than resent your employer or hardly think about money in the middle of the month.
